title: Understanding Anxiety Measurement Tools
text: Anxiety can be measured using various tools. Some of these tools are specifically designed to assess anxiety levels in individuals.

title: Common Anxiety Inventories
text: There are specific inventories that are widely used to measure anxiety. These inventories are standardized and have been validated through research.

hintAnswer: $$State-Trait$$ Anxiety Inventory (STAI) and the Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI)
title: Identifying the Right Inventories
text: Which of the following inventories are used to measure anxiety?
choices: $$State-Trait$$ Anxiety Inventory (STAI) and the Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI)
